Ukweli-4

Ukweli-4 was a top-secret research facility built to study a mysterious meteorite with an unknown and never before seen color. The facility was located on a C-Type asteroid, and its entrance was a tunnel bored directly into the asteroid's surface.

Tragically, the original researchers at Ukweli-4 died in an accident whose exact nature remains unknown. As a result, the facility became abandoned and left to the ravages of time. Foundation personnel later recovered the meteorite and relocated it to another facility for continued research.

The fate of the Ukweli-4 facility remains shrouded in mystery, with no official records of the accident or the events that transpired.

Cluster
Banquo
System
Ypsilon
